channel.title: Log in spot?!?!?!?!And log in items?
channel.description:
How do i change the log in spot when people first log in for the frist time? It makes them start off at the east varrock bank but i want to change it to some other place how would I do that?
Also how do I change the items when they frist log in? Like it gives them noobie things and i want to change it.

item.title: Log in spot?!?!?!?!And log in items?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Everything to do with a player first logging in is inside of player.java (well, atleast all the stuff that you’re interested in).

You can change the x and y coordinates of a first player’s login, and what they’re wearing inside of that. Just browse through the beginning of it (first few dozens of lines).

Read full topic
item.source: Log in spot?!?!?!?!And log in items?
